# Householder transform benchmark

## Notation

- tr: Triton
- to: Torch
- toc: Torch Compile

## H100

### Speed

```
householder-speed-fwd-batch4-dim2048-bf16:
         n        tr        to       toc
0   1024.0  0.072548  0.295114  0.094965
1   2048.0  0.064028  0.536903  0.097004
2   4096.0  0.073690  1.027356  0.102248
3   8192.0  0.138940  1.983998  0.181846
4  16384.0  0.267981  3.896701  0.350949
5  32768.0  0.526869  7.725927  0.691192

householder-speed-bwd-batch4-dim2048-bf16:
         n        tr         to       toc
0   1024.0  0.807055   1.614983  1.451516
1   2048.0  1.277255   1.787878  1.495749
2   4096.0  0.637103   2.494297  0.362278
3   8192.0  0.728476   4.868768  1.468796
4  16384.0  0.965760   9.613760  1.602616
5  32768.0  1.915647  19.104456  1.918946
```
